list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: kill or wound (a person or animal) with a bullet or arrow.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was shot in the leg during an armed robbery

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: move suddenly and rapidly in a particular direction.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chiếc xe bắn về phía trước

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in soccer, hockey, basketball, etc.) kick, hit, or throw the ball or puck in an attempt to score a goal.
film or photograph (a scene, film, etc.).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she has just been commissioned to shoot a video
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cô ấy vừa được ủy thác để quay video

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một số năm một hoặc nhà máy khác không bắn

an occasion when a group of people hunt and shoot game for sport.
an occasion when a professional photographer takes photographs or when a film or video is being made.
